name: Deepakk S Geraa
bio:
Deepakk has been part of the outsourcing world for the last 21 years. He has headed and managed various verticals starting from Technology, Telecom, Enterprise, Back-office, and Logistics. He has worked at leadership level with companies like Amazon, Convergys, Sitel, and ICICI.

At Aurrus, Deepakk is heading Business Engagement and Client Relations.
